rare_items.name: Armor of Resistance
rare_items.notes: Roll a d10 to determine Damage Type (table found on item card).

rare_items.name: Armor of Vulnerability
rare_items.notes: Unfortunate GOTCHA for the soul who purchases this. Display it as Armor of Invulnerability. Hopefully the reduced price drives off potential buyers.

rare_items.name: Bag of Beans
rare_items.notes: Inside this heavy cloth bag are 3d4 dry beans.

rare_items.name: Bead of Force
rare_items.notes: Typically, 1d4 + 4 beads of force are found together.

rare_items.name: Cauldron of Plenty
rare_items.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

rare_items.name: Chromatic Rose
rare_items.notes: Roll 1d5 to determine a color based on the item's object description.

rare_items.name: Feather Token
rare_items.notes: Roll a d100 to determine what type of Feather Token is present. These tokens have differing gold values.

rare_items.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power
rare_items.notes: Roll 1d7, choosing from this list: 1. Bronze Griffon, 2. Ebony Fly, 3. Golden Lions, 4. Ivory Goats, 5. Marble Elephant, 6. Onyx Dog, 7. Serpentine Owl. These each have differing gold costs.

rare_items.name: Guild Keyrune
rare_items.notes: Roll 1d6 and take the result from this list: 1. Azorius Keyrune, 2. Boros Keyrune, 3. Gruul Keyrune, 4. Izzet Keyrune, 5. Orzhov Keyrune, 6. Selesnya Keyrune. These have different gold costs.

rare_items.name: Helm of the Gods
rare_items.notes: Roll 1d15 and take the result from the list on the object description.

rare_items.name: Hook of Fisher's Delight
rare_items.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

rare_items.name: Horn of the Endless Maze
rare_items.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

rare_items.name: Horn of Valhalla
rare_items.notes: Roll 1d2 and select the option from the following: 1. Silver Horn, 2. Brass Horn. Prices vary.

rare_items.name: Instrument of the Bards: Canaith mandolin
Instrument of the Bards: Cli lyre
Ioun Stone
rare_items.notes: Roll 1d10 and take the result from the following list: 1. Awareness, 2. Protection, 3. Reserve, 4. Sustenance, 5. Supreme Intellect, 6. Historical Knowledge, 7. Natural Knowledge, 8. Religious Knowledge, 9. Language Knowledge, 10. Self-Preservation. These have differing gold costs.

rare_items.name: Master's Amulet
rare_items.notes: Generates a rigorous quest to find a shield guardian.

rare_items.name: Necklace of Fireballs
rare_items.notes: This necklace has 1d6 + 3 beads hanging from it.

rare_items.name: Necklace of Prayer Beads
rare_items.notes: This necklace has 1d4 + 2 magic beads made from aquamarine, black pearl, or topaz. Roll 1d20 for each bead and consult the item's description.

rare_items.name: Outer Essence Shard
rare_items.notes: Roll a d4 and consult the Outer Essence Shards table to determine the shard’s essence and property. The item's gold value varies based on the result.

rare_items.name: Professor Orb
rare_items.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
rare_items.notes: The orb is sentient and has the personality of a scholar. Its alignment is determined by rolling on the alignment table in the “Sentient Magic Items” section in the Dungeon Master’s Guide.

rare_items.name: Professor Skant
rare_items.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

legendary_items.name: Crystal Ball
legendary_items.notes: Roll 1d3 and use the results from the following list: 1. Mind Reading, 2. Telepathy, 3. True Seeing.

legendary_items.name: Deck of Many Things
legendary_items.notes: Most (75 percent) of these decks have only thirteen cards, but the rest have twenty-two.

legendary_items.notes: Come up with a cool name for the dragon whose hoard this steeped in. Roll for Dragon Type and Color.

Grimoire Infinitus

legendary_items.name: Helm of the Scavenger
legendary_items.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

legendary_items.name: Hide of the Feral Guardian
legendary_items.notes: Roll 1d3. Take the result from the following list: 1. Dormant, 2. Awakened, 3. Exalted.

legendary_items.name: Infiltrator's Key
legendary_items.notes: Roll 1d3. Take the result from the following list: 1. Dormant, 2. Awakened, 3. Exalted.

legendary_items.name: Ioun Stone
legendary_items.notes: Roll 1d3. Take the result from the following list: 1. Mastery, 2. Regeneration, 3. Greater Absorption.

legendary_items.name: Iron Flask
legendary_items.notes: Roll 1d100. Take the result from the table on the item description.

legendary_items.name: Jewel of Three Prayers
legendary_items.source: Critical Role: Call of the Netherdeep
legendary_items.notes: Roll 1d3. Take the result from the following list: 1. Dormant, 2. Awakened, 3. Exalted.

legendary_items.name: Moonblade
legendary_items.notes: A moonblade has one rune on its blade for each master it has served (typically 1d6 + 1). The first rune always grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Each rune beyond the first grants the moonblade an additional property. The DM chooses each property or determines it randomly on the Moon Blade Properties table.

legendary_items.name: Ring of Elemental Command
legendary_items.notes: Roll 1d4 and take the result from the following list: 1. Air, 2. Earth, 3. Fire, 4. Water. These vary in cost.

legendary_items.name: Ascendant Scaled Ornament
legendary_items.notes: Come up with a cool name for the dragon whose hoard this steeped in. Roll for Dragon Type and Color.

legendary_items.name: Sovereign Glue
legendary_items.notes: When found, a container contains 1d6 + 1 ounces.

legendary_items.name: Spell Bottle
legendary_items.notes: When found, roll a d6 and subtract 1; the total determines the level of spell in the bottle (the DM chooses the spell, and 0 means the bottle is empty).

legendary_items.name: Spell Gem
legendary_items.notes: Roll 1d3 and take the result from the following list: 1. Diamond, 2. Ruby, 3. Star Ruby.

legendary_items.name: Sword of Answering
legendary_items.notes: Only nine of these blades are known to exist.

legendary_items.name: Tome of the Stilled Tongue
legendary_items.notes: Five of these tomes exist, and it's unknown which one is the original.

legendary_items.name: Verminshroud
legendary_items.notes: Roll 1d3. Take the result from the following list: 1. Dormant, 2. Awakened, 3. Exalted.

legendary_items.name: Wreath of the Prism
legendary_items.notes: Roll 1d3. Take the result from the following list: 1. Dormant, 2. Awakened, 3. Exalted.

legendary_items.name: Ythryn Mythallar
legendary_items.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
